alert.note: Alert for Gibson; Posey; Vanderburgh (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 03 at 3:07AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Wabash, northwestern Vanderburgh, southwestern Gibson and northeastern Posey Counties through 245 AM CDT... At 207 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Owensville, or 10 miles south of Mount Carmel, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Owensville and Poseyville around 220 AM CDT. Cynthiana around 225 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fort Branch and Haubstadt. This includes Interstate 64 in Indiana between Mile Markers 5 and 20. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
